pages.text: dongjjoggwa seojjog-ui junimkke maengse hasa gwonseneun geubunkke issnola
geudeulboda na-eun daleun baegseongdeul lo geudeul-eul daechehal su iss-eumyeo hananim-eun geuleohge ham-e bujogham-i eobsno la
geuleomeulo geudeul-i mu-ighan dae hwa-e ppajyeo geudeul-i yagsogbad-eun geunal e jigmyeonhal ttaekkaji mankkighadolog beo lyeodula
geudeul-i geudeul-ui mudeom-eulo bu teo seodeulleo naoneun geunal geudeul-eun machi seodulleo usang-egelo ganeun geos gatdeola
sil-uie ppajin geudeul-ui nundeul-eun alaelo naelyeojyeo iss-eumyeo suchiga geu deul-eul ewossani geuleoham-i geudeul-i yagsogbad-eun nal-ila
sillo hananim-i noaleul geuui baegseong-ege bonaem-eun geudeul wie gotong seuleoun eungbeol-i imhagi jeon-e baegseong deul-ege gyeong-gohagoja hasyeoss-euni
geuga malhayeossdeola baegseongdeul-iyeo sillo naneun bunmyeonghan gyeong-gojaloseo neo huiege wassnola
hananim-eul gyeongbaehago geubun man-euldulyeowo hamyeo na-ege sunjonghala
geulihamyeon geubunkkeseo neohuiui jalmos-eul yongseohasa iljeong gigankkaji neo huileul yuyehana sillo hananim-ui yu ye gigan-i ileul ttaemyeon yuyedoel su eobsnola
geuga malhayeossdeola juyeo jeoneun bamnaj-eulo jeohui baegseongdeul-eul indohalyeohayeossseubnida
geuleona midneun jadeul-eun jeung-gahaji anihago baleun gil-eseo beos-eonaneun jadeul-i neul-eonassseubnida
dangsinkkeseo geudeul-eul yongseohal geos-i la jega malhal ttaemada geudeul-eun geudeul ui songalag-eulo gwileul maggo os-eul yeo mimyeo geoyeoghago omanhal ppun-ibnida
geulihayeo jeoneun geudeul-ege soli nop-yeo hosohayeossseubnida
daejung ap-eseodo geulaessgo boiji anhgedo hosohaess-eumyeo
junim-eulobuteo yongseoleul guhalasillo geubun-eun gwan-yong-eulo chungmanhasin bun-ila malhayeossgo
